title: Keepers of Aureon's Veil
text: The Keepers of [[Aureon]]'s Veil are a semi-monastic [[arcane order]], who maintain the [[Starpeaks Observatory|Starpeaks]] in the mountains close to the village of [[Askelios]]. While reclusive, they are respected for their exceptional work with [[divination]]; when a Keeper addresses the [[Arcane Congress]], people listen.
